name: Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: 3B Thac Bac Street, Sapa, Lao Cai, Sa Pa, Việt Nam
description:
Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Sa Pa. Với quầy bar, khách sạn nằm gần một số điểm tham quan nổi tiếng, cách Hồ Sa Pa chưa đến 1 km, Sa Pa Stone Church 5 phút đi bộ và Sa Pa Bus Station 800 m. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Khách có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa tại chỗ nghỉ.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa cách Trạm cáp treo Fansipan 4.5 km và Ham Rong Garden - Ham Rong Mountain 17 phút đi bộ. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách khách sạn 221 km.

review.comment_positive:
Abbiamo apprezzato tutto, soprattutto gentilezza e disponibilità dello staff, e la dimensione della camera rispetto agli standard vietnamiti. La colazione buona e soddisfacente, segnalo che si trova  prevalentemente cibo asiatico (poca roba dolce stile colazione italiana per intenderci). Ambienti puliti. Abbiamo usufruito del servizio Spa, che consiglio dopo i trekking, massaggiatrici molto brave. Dopo il check out abbiamo potuto lasciare in deposito i bagagli, per goderci liberamente le ultime ore a sapa. Posizione comoda vicino al centro (si può raggiungere a piedi la zona di CatCat) , e, per noi, vicino all'agenzia dei bus di cui abbiamo usufruito per raggiungere/lasciare Sapa.
Assolutamente soddisfatti della scelta.

review.comment_negative:
Surrounded by renovations. Works started 6am on Sunday. We checked in after an overnight train ride. To our horror the drilling was on the same wall on our bedroom. Ms Trang waived our early checked in fees and granted our request for change of room. It was better but the drilling and hacking noise level remained unacceptable. 

Room is not well kept. Broken window shield in bathroom exposed the toilet to the road. 

Located at very steep hill. Zero view. Take a 50% disc off pictures shown. For the price paid, it’s totally not worth it.  Even with the great service rendered by Ms Trang, the stay is not recommended.

review.comment_positive:
Quiet part of town. Not in the main area. Staff were very helpful with information about Sapa. Helped us to book tickets to Fansipan. Note that Fansipan cable car is closed from 8 of Jan 2024 to 8 Feb 2024. Check before going.

Eden massage and spa just across from the hotel with great service.

We took a train from Hanoi to Lao Cai and the hotel organised a transfer for us from the train station to the hotel which was great for the early morning. Rested in the lobby and had breakfast till our rooms were ready.

Lots of eateries and massage places just nearby. Shopping was down the slope and down the stairs near Sun Plaza Sapa Station.

review.rating: A great hotel with lovely and helpful staff
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ
review.comment_positive: A great hotel located in the centre of Sapa. The room (a junior suite) was fantastic with a great bathroom. The staff were very friendly and helpful and booked our tickets to Mount Fansipan for us. The breakfasts were good with a mix of Vietnamese and European food, including omelettes and eggs and bacon. I would highly recommend the trip up Mount Fansipan. Also only book hiking etc when you arrive in Sapa with the Black Hmong people. It’s a major source of income for them. We booked straight off the bus with Song (pronounced Shon) and she was wonderful. The guides are all women and they speak some English. We went back to Shon’s house for lunch and to meet her family and it was a great experience.

review.comment_positive:
I enjoyed my stay at Eden Hotel, the location was accessible and just a short walk from the city center. The staff were very attentive and helpful! Special mention to Any and Trang who ensured I was well taken care of every step of my journey- from arranging transport from Hanoi airport to the hotel, to buying tickets for Fansipan mountain and arranging transport for my Homestay 😍 

Breakfast was simple but fresh and delicious. Room was well designed, new and clean. I love how my room has a balcony which faced the greenery. Wonderful experience! Thank you! 🦋✨🙏🏼

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal u die Eigentümer sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie helfen gerne bei den täglichen Reisebuchungen. 
Das Zimmer ist nicht zu gross aber ausreichend zum Schlafen. Das Bett hatte gute Matratzen. Der Spabereich des Hotels dh die angebotenen Massagen sind zwar teilweise doppelt so teuer wie im Ort aber es war sehr sauber und das Personal fachlich sehr gut ausgebildet.
review.comment_negative: Die Zimmer in diesem Hotel sind extrem hellhörig. Jedes Gespräch in den Zimmern nebenan sowie Duschen, Strassenlärm etc war zu hören. Der Frühstücksbereich ist direkt beim  Eingangsbereich dh im Winter ist es dort unangenehm und sehr kalt da ständig Leute aus u eingehen. Das Personal läuft ganztägig mit Daunenjacken -mäntel umher.  Die Klimaanlage wird trotzdem nicht als Heizung benutzt. Aktuell befindet sich eine längere Baustelle direkt neben dem Hotel. Der Rohbau ist noch nicht ganz fertig. Es könnte also sehr laut werden da das Gebäude direkt an das Hotel angebaut wird.

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Die Frühstückszeit beginnt ab 7.00 Uhr morgens.

Die Reisebusse aus Hanoi kommen früh morgens um 5.30 in Sapa an. Im Hotel darf man sich bis zum Frühstück bzw. zur CheckIn-Zeit im Frühstücksbereich aufhalten oder auch sein Gepäck abstellen und die erste Tour beginnen.
Touren und Fahrkarten/Transfers können über das Hotel gebucht werden.

Es gibt ein kleines Frühstücksbuffett, zusätzlich kann ma a la carte z.B. Pancakes, Omelett,... bestellen.

Die Lage ist zentral, das Hotel liegt an einem kleinen Hang, zu Fuß geht es also die letzten Meter bergauf.

Service und Zimmer sind gut.
review.comment_negative:
Unsere gebuchte Junior-Suite entsprach der Größe unseres Hotelzimmers in Hanoi. Der Name 'Suite' war für uns etwas irreführend.
Nebenan gibt es eine Baustelle, die Arbeiten beginnen um 6.30 Uhr. Uns hat es nicht gestört, da wir jeden Tag früh unterwegs waren.

review.comment_positive: Sehr gutes Hotel in top Lage um Sapa zu erkunden. Das Personal hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen, trotz der frühen Ankunft um 6 Uhr. Die vorab Konversation auf Englich lief problemlos und wir haben super Restaurant und Massage Empfehlungen bekommen. Das Zimmer war modern, sauber und komfortabel. Frühstück war ausreichend und es wurden bspw. Omlett, Pankakes, French Toast frusch zubereitet.

review.rating: tạm chấp nhận, nếu cách tâm tốt sẽ rất ok
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Sạch sẽ là điều tôi rất thích, cô lễ tân nhiệt tình, thân thiện, helpful, niềm nở đón tiếp, sẵn sàng giúp đở khi khách hàng có yêu cầu. Dịch vụ  massage cũng rất ok. Bữa sáng cũng ổn, tôi là người ăn chay vẫn có món toast
review.comment_negative:
Điều tôi cực kỳ khó chịu là phòng hoàn toàn không cách âm được. Cô lễ  tân sắp xếp cho tôi ở tầng trên cùng là tầng 6 nhưng trên tầng 6 lại có một gác lửng để các bạn nhân viên giặt giũ, giặt khăn phơi lên. Tôi ngước lên thấy. Và khi các bạn leo lên cầu thang sắt hoặc leo xuống tôi nghe rất to và không ngủ được. Bên ngoài hành lang nói chuyện mà cũng vọng vào phòng tôi. Trong toilet vẫn nghe đuọc tiếng phòng kế bên nói chuyện. Lúc tôi ở có vài khách ng Hàn còn thức và nc to khiến tôi rất khó chịu. Tôi cũng gọi lễ tân và trình bày việc này. 
Một điều nữa là khách sạn ở đường Phố Thác Bạc là trên dốc chứ k phải đường Thác Bạc. Phải đi lên dốc cũng khá cao vì đoạn Thác Bạc bên ngoài nếu bạn đi bộ đã phải leo dốc rồi.
Hi vọng khắc phục được việc cách âm

review.rating: Awesome location and staff, but lousy last-mile intercity transport arrangements
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Eden Hotel & Spa is within walking distance to the attractions and food and beverage on central Sapa. The staff, Ms Trang, Andy et al were exceptional in recommending what to do, where to go for the best coffee, best view of the valley.
review.comment_negative: I had booked my transfer from and back to Hanoi through Eden. The incoming trip from Hanoi to Sapa was smooth but the return trip to Hanoi was a) late, b) the bus was a cheaper bus than the price I paid for, c) the driver dropped me off at the wrong destination in Hanoi. Maybe Eden Hotel should re-evaluate their transport partners to avoid such last mile gaps.

А самое ужасное, что через стенку шла стройка и было ужасно шумно. На стадии бронирования этой информации не было. И на ресепшене ничего не сказали, пока мы не зарегистрировались. Снимали номер только на сутки, но и этого хватило! А с балконом и видом из окна полное враньё! Номер на 3-ем этаже, выходишь на балкон, ты на первом и вид на дорогу и стройку.

If you’re an early riser it’s fine but I feel sorry for any parents with young children that require a mid day nap.

review.comment_positive: The staff here are spectacular and friendly.  They helped us book any tours and trips we wanted, assisted with transportation back to HaNoi and gave us tips and advice about Sapa.  The room was clean. The bed comfortable and the shower was good.  The hotel is adjacent to the busier area of downtown Sapa so access was easy while the noise level was minimal.  It is a 2 minute walk to the Sapa station to Fansipan and there are excellent restaurants nearby....oh, and the included breakfast was great with lots of choice.  Highly recommend this hotel.

review.rating: Super fijn hotel, waar voor je geld.

review.comment_positive:
Zeer ruime, mooie en schone kamer met een erg fijn bed. Het personeel is super vriendelijk en meedenkend. Veel keuze bij het ontbijt. Er werd helaas verbouwd bij de buren waardoor er geluidsoverlast was, maar het personeel onderscheidde zich door zich hier veelvuldig voor te verontschuldigen. 
Ook konden we via dit hotel vervoer naar de vervolgplek regelen, alsook informatie inwinnen over tours en excursies in en rond Sapa.

review.comment_positive: Much appreciate of the support from Ms Trang that had supported us for travel arrangements.  Room was clean, comfortable and the location is good.  Staffs (Ms Trang and Andy) are always smiling and helpful.  Location is good as it is near to many eating places with nice foods and drinks.  We have a great Sapa Trip much contribute the effort of Ms Trang recommendations.  She has made Vietnam proud of able to promote the attraction of Sapa and make the trips so memorable.   Wishing her always be an asset to the Hotel.  Future, if there is a plan to Sapa, we are going to stay there again!

They let us check in early (at a slight fee) and use the showers and bathrooms after checking out. A hotel employee (Trang) gave us a really good recommendation with a tour to ta vang (hike via the mountains with impeccable views - cous was our tour guide, she was lovely) and fansipan mountain.

L’hôtel est super bien situé. Super rapport qualité /prix

review.comment_negative: Das Hotel war sehr hellhörig, und direkt nebenan wurde ein weiteres Hotel gebaut. Die Mitarbeiter hatten ihre Arbeitsplätze in der oberen Etage, wodurch es dort sehr laut war, da keine Rücksicht auf die Gäste genommen wurde. Sie unterhielten und riefen sich gegenseitig durch den Korridor. Dadurch war es unmöglich, einen Mittagsschlaf zu machen. Wir hoffen, dass das Hotelmanagement in Zukunft Maßnahmen ergreift, um diese Lärmbelästigung zu reduzieren und den Gästen einen angenehmeren Aufenthalt  zu ermöglichen.

review.rating: Good room but a lot of construction noise in the surrounding.
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ
review.comment_positive: The room was great. We booked a Junior Suite. The bath tub was classical and royal.
review.comment_negative:
There was construction noise that started from 6 am in the morning. It got worse with constant drilling and hammering. One of the staff lady named as Nuoam was good to help and change our room but the we could still hear a lot of construction noise.

Also, when we arrived early in the morning, there was a boy who asked us to pay 700,000 VND for early check-in. We denied and then he asked for 500,000. We still refused. When we came back to hotel after two hours, there was another lady named as Trang. She told us that all the rooms are still occupied and we need to wait. It was a bit surprising how the guy wanted to charge us money and suddenly there was no room available. 

However, the lady Nuoam helped again here to get us an early check-in.

시내이면서 깟깟마을과도 가깝다 성당,판시판역,콩카페,사파광장 모두 걸어서 5분이다 시설은 사진 그대로이며 매우매우 깨끗하고 아름답다 조식은 간단하지만 깨끗하고 맛있다 숙박비가 아주 싸면서도 시설과 서비스가 최상급이다  친절하고 최선을 다해서 도와준다 약간의 비용으로 어얼리체크인이 가능하며 조식도 추가로 먹을수있다 소수민족마을 트래킹을 위한 현지가이드를 저렴하게 소개받았다
다음 숙소로 배낭을 보낼수도 있다(유료) 그래서 짐없이 트래킹이나 여행을 할수있다

Habitación limpia y cómoda, bastante espaciosa, baño limpio, instalaciones en buen estado
Desayuno tipo buffet bastante completo y rico, de los mejores que hemos probado en Vietnam 
Pero sin duda lo que más me gustó fue la amabilidad del personal, desde el primer momento intentaron prepararnos la habitación cuanto antes para hacer el check in puesto que habíamos llegado en el bus nocturno. Nos ayudaron a gestionar el bus directo hasta Cat Ba y el alquiler de la moto. Además, el día del check out nos guardaron el equipaje e incluso nos dejaron ducharnos antes de irnos.

review.comment_positive: Rooms were really spacious and clean with good facilities. Bathroom had a bath which was a godsend after a long day trekking around the villages of Sa Pa. review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten dort eingecheckt nachdem wir zuvor leider in einem Homestay mit Kakerlakenproblem gelandet waren. Unsere primäre Anforderung war also eine insektenfreie Unterkunft, was zur vollen Zufriedenheit erfüllt wurde. Wir hatten einen sehr sehr hohen Rabatt auf unser Zimmer und für den sehr niedrigen Preis war es auch sehr Luxuriös, gut eingerichtet und in Sapa eine sehr angenehme Lage, nicht ganz zentral aber in Laufweite zur Innenstadt und vielen veganen Restaurants. Das Frühstücksbüffet ist riesig mit sehr viel Auswahl und das Personal unglaublich freundlich und zuvorkommend.
review.comment_negative: Eigentlich alles in Ordnung, den regulären Preis hätte ich für das Zimmer ein kleines bisschen zu hoch gefunden, da es zwar sauber aber sich nicht perfekt gereinigt war, unser Balkon direkt ebenerdig in einer Baustelle auf der Rückseite war, und die Möbel zum Teil etwas abgelebt wirkten. Ansonsten aber trotzdem ein sehr hübsches Hotel, das man allen empfehlen kann die etwas luxuriöser in Sapa absteigen wollen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình Thông nhau
review.comment_positive:
Very friendly and joyful staff. They always greet you and there to help us. Love the property being near to the town. Less than 5mins walk. They have Spa which provide discounts on specific timing… We just love the service from Ms Trang, and the other 2 gentlemen, sorry I forget their names. Room is clean and spacious, we booked connecting set for family of 5.

Very well done to all, we really had an enjoyable and relaxing stay. Kuddos

Cheers

review.rating: The best place I’ve stayed in Sout East Asia
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ
review.comment_positive: I cannot fault this hotel. It is stunning fit out of what looks like an historic building. Superbly clean. The bed was so so so comfortable - the best sleep I’ve had in SEA; and the staff were incredible. Without being overbearing they went to every length to ensure our stay with Eden, and Sapa, was unforgettable. I had a rip in my skirt, and they insisted I give it to them, and they mended it with love, for free. The breakfast was tasty and substantial.
review.comment_negative: To absolutely NO fault of the hotel, there is some construction works next door, which starts about 8am - which is mostly fine for travellers wanting to make the most of the day. I understand they’ve adjusted their pricing to accommodate.

review.comment_positive:
Hi Everyone, 
We Went as a couple for an October Trip right across Vietnam. We reached at SAPA around 2:00 PM. There was Miss Trang at the reception. Have to say she has gone out of here way to help us  whenever we wanted. Even, what we seen and heard the Hotel has made available alternate rooms, free breakfast, early checkin with minimal charge something which other hotels have strict rules about. To add the Cook is very senior and the the young lady and guy who accompany him in serving  the guests do a wonderful job in arranging for a cozy tasty breakfast. Over and above, you will find Young Andy at the reception very informative and active in suggesting new places to try food and roaming around. The hotel staff understands English very well. All in all the stay was fabulous.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ
review.comment_positive:
If you are looking for a comfortable classy stay with exceptional service, this is the place to be.

The price is reasonable, the rooms are beautiful and clean. Close to the central with 5 minutes of walking distance. There's a 'ăn vặt'/snack chill place close by (red house) where you can get spicy noodles and other fast food style snacks, perfect for the cold weather.

Vũ from the front desk was very professional and friendly. He assisted us with making sure that the Chapa Express shuttle bus was going to pick us up at the right time.

Also try their newly opened Eden Massage. Wonderful experience.

Thanks.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: My experience at Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa was overall quite positive. The room was comfortable and well-appointed, offering everything one would expect from a boutique hotel. Cleanliness was top-notch, and the air conditioning worked efficiently, ensuring a pleasant stay even during hot weather. The hotel provided all the necessary facilities, making it convenient for guests. The Wi-Fi connection was reliable, which was important for staying connected. The location, while not right in the town center, was still convenient, being only 15 minutes away. Additionally, the hotel offered tours, which were incredibly convenient for exploring the area without having to worry about logistics. Overall, Eden Boutique Hotel & Spa provided a comfortable and convenient stay, with amenities and services that met expectations.

review.comment_positive: It was my first time to Sapa and I was initially concerned about how I can get to Sapa from the airport but the staff at Eden, esp. review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Having stayed in "4-star" hotel in Hanoi with not so nice experience before coming to Sapa, I had lowered my expectations for my trip in Sapa. However, this hotel exceeded my expectations and exactly same as the reviews I read. The room was spacious, clean, tastefully decorated and comfortable. Comfortable bed and pillows. Shower is strong and hot. As I stayed in the hotel in previous nights and checked out for my 2D1N trekking, the moment I returned to the hotel, the manager could tell my name immediately and check-in was done. This is the true spirit of hospitality line. She also helped to arrange for bus tickets to Hanoi with the bus company I specified, and booked the funicular+ cable car tickets to Fansipan, which saved me a lot of hassles booking by myself. The staff are always proactive in giving advice. One of the staff (sorry I forgot to ask for his name) gave suggestions to a BBQ dinner just opposite Sun Plaza, which was good, reasonably priced, and with wide selection of food. The spa opposite the hotel is also very good.  I enjoyed the stay very much and will come back again.
review.comment_negative: The side of the room with balcony is sound-proof, which is really nice. However, the side with the door is not. The doors of the rooms close quite loudly, that means I could hear my neighbours in and out of their rooms even in the middle of the night. I'm afraid I also disturbed other people though I don't usually close the doors very hard.  I hope the hotel can improve the mechanism of the doors so guests don't get disturbed by their (night owl) neighbours.

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Và Nhà Thờ

Le personnel est très sympathique et organise des excursions (il réserve pour vous les billets pour le mont Fansipan et propose des tours dans les rizières).
La chambre est confortable et l’hôtel est très bien situé.
review.comment_negative:
Le petit déjeuner est un peu décevant et la salle de bain manque un petit peu de propreté.
Nous étions déçu de voir que les photos ne correspondaient pas toujours à la réalité.

Thank you for providing such a memorable and delightful experience.
